gui.bgamesmod.cognitive.experience_butto: If player level < 33, set the player level to 33, else give to the player 6 levels
gui.bgamesmod.cognitive.pickup_boost_des: Increase the range to pick up item in 1 blocks per lvl
gui.bgamesmod.cognitive.reach_boost_desc: Increase the range to interact in 2 blocks per lvl
gui.bgamesmod.social.area_regeneration_d: Apply Regeneration II for players, pets or horses
gui.bgamesmod.social.area_strength_descr: Apply Strength III to nearby players, pets or horses
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.p: Lingering Potion of Pick Up Boost
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.pick: Splash Potion of Pick Up Boost
login.bgameslibrary.not_logged: Not logged in bGames, please use /login command before play
